monster.name: Sea Elven

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The elf can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
trait.text: The elf has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the elf to sleep.

trait.name: Friend of the Sea
trait.text: The elf can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
trait.text: The elf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage, or 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.description: Sea elves are a reclusive and deeply territorial people who have as much in common with merfolk as they do with other elves.

trait.text: The elf can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Dark Devotion
